name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On Monday, February 10, BYD announced that it will also install a new version of its intelligent driving system "Eye of God" on low-priced models. BYD will use this to achieve "full-system self-driving". The Wall Street Journal analyzed that this will further expand its lead over Tesla in launching AI-driven driving technology to Chinese car buyers. Tesla has been unable to release its latest assisted driving software in the Chinese market.
